alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 09 at 8:41AM PDT until April 09 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sustained northwest winds 15 to 20 mph, with gusts near 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Coastal Range and northwestern portion of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From 7 AM PDT this morning until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles, such as campers and tractor trailers. Blowing dust will reduce visibilities in some locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 33, Interstate 5 north of Kettleman City, Highway 198 west of Lemoore, Highway 180 west of Kerman, and Highway 152 through Pacheco Pass.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
